DOC.brief_summary: This study compare CTAP201 Doxercalciferol patient chronic kidney disease ( CKD ) secondary hyperparathyroidism ( SHPT ) , undergo regular hemodialysis , different dose strength . This study also investigate level CTAP201 body time determine safety CTAP201 .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison I.V . CTAP201 Doxercalciferol ( Hectorol ) Subjects With Chronic Kidney Disease ( CKD ) Secondary Hyperparathyroidism ( SHPT )
DOC.criteria: Body mass index 18 40 On maintenance hemodialysis three time per week Visit 1 : Serum iPTH value great equal 200 pg/mL lower equal 1000 pg/mL Visit 1 : Serum total calcium value great 8.4 mg/dL low 10.0 mg/dL Visit 1 : Serum phosphorus value great equal 2.5 mg/dL low equal 5.5 mg/dL Serum 25hydroxyvitamin D level great equal 15 ng/mL Visit 2 : Serum iPTH value great 300 pg/mL Visit 2 : Serum Ca x P product le 56 [ mg/dl ] 2 Willing able discontinue vitamin D and/or bone metabolism therapy least 2 week prior administration Study Drug , length study Taking cytochrome P450 3A inhibitor and/or inducer Abnormal liver function
